author: amyroh
msg: Complete global and context JNDI resources support in admin webapp.
The page hangs when removing resource link from context resources.

msg: When removing JNDI resources, setNamingResources(null) after triggering

author: rubys
msg: While most JDK's on Windows are very tolerant of backslashes in file:
URLs, they are not consisent in exactly WHEN they make the transition

author: amyroh
msg: Fix for CompressionFilter to work with Weblogic 6.1.  It used to work incorrect
for Web logic 6.1 in case the threshold is less than the len parameter in
CompressionResponseStream.write(byte b[], int off, int len).  The filter worked
correctly on Tomcat since this situation never happens, but fails with Weblogic 6.1.
Submitted by Dmitri Valdin.  Thanks Dmitri.
